page.title: 10A Day in the Life of Richard
page.content: I get up at 7.30,I go down stairs and then I wash my face with soap and water.Then I go up stairs and get changed into some trousers,a tee-shirt and a jumper and socks.I come down stairs and have cornflakes. After that I go back up stairs,get my coat and my binoculars and go out birdwatching for 2 or 3 hours at a time.I usually see robins, bluetits, jays,magpies and crows.Then I go to have my dinner.I have peas,roast potatoes,pork and gravy.After that I feed my birds and then I take my dog for a walk for 1 hour.Next I go and have my tea.It is pork sandwiches. Then I have my supper.It is some Kiwi fruit and I go to bed at 9.00pm. About half an hour later I go to sleep.
